title-part.text: WORKING OR PROCESSING OF SHEET METAL OR METAL TUBES, RODS OR PROFILES WITHOUT ESSENTIALLY REMOVING MATERIAL

reference.text: operations of the kind involved in the manufacture of such products B21B, B21C; working or processing of wire B21F; cutting or severing devices or machines in general B26; presses in general B30B

note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers cutting or perforating of sheet metal or other stock material
This subclass does not cover the working of metal foils in a manner analogous to the working of paper, which is covered by classes B26, B31

title-part.text: Straightening, restoring form or removing local distortions of sheet metal or specific articles made therefrom
